title: Exquisite Ruby and Polki Diamond Drop Earrings - Chand Bali Inspired
materials: Burmese Ruby. Features high-quality craftsmanship with meticulously selected gemstones.
features: Classic South Indian teardrop design. The polki diamonds are set in a closed setting (kundan) reflecting traditional techniques. The earrings exhibit a Chand Bali (crescent moon) inspired silhouette, reimagined for a modern aesthetic with a cascading gemstone arrangement.
colors: Rich gold hue complemented by the fiery red of the Burmese Ruby and the subtle sparkle of the Polki Diamonds. This creates a beautiful contrast embodying traditional Telugu wedding jewelry color palettes.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings (Muhurtham)
or any event where you want to add a touch of regal elegance. Suitable for both traditional South Indian attire like sarees and lehengas
description: These earrings beautifully blend traditional South Indian artistry with modern design sensibilities. The use of high-quality Polki Diamonds and Burmese Rubies ensures lasting brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, warm luster, adding to its antique charm. These earrings are a timeless investment piece that will be cherished for generations.
